synopsis.text: Miyako's quiet college life takes an unexpected turn when her younger sister, Hinata, introduces her to the charming Hana, a fifth-grader with an angelic demeanor. As an otaku and a self-proclaimed introvert, Miyako finds herself instantly smitten with Hana, leading to a series of humorous and heartwarming encounters as she attempts to win her affection. Despite her clumsy advances and overwhelming shyness, Miyako's persistent efforts to grow closer to Hana slowly begin to bear fruit, resulting in a delightful tale of friendship, love, and the pursuit of happiness. Get ready to embark on a comedic journey filled with cosplay, sweets, and the unforgettable adventures of a shy college student and her adorable younger companion.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
